name: Stealth
description: The stealthy character excels both at not being seen and at hiding in plain sight. Stealth can be used to camouflage or hide yourself, but also to shadow someone while concealing your presence in a crowd.
advantages: Soundless environment such as a vacuum
disadvantages: Noisy equipment such as body armor
sample_tests: Sneaking up on someone (DN Contested Awareness)
Concealing a gun from a check (DN Contested Awareness)
